comments.body: Previously we'd bail early rather than issuing both messages here. I could probably contort it a bit to only issue one of the two errors; but I feel like having both is slightly more descriptive, actually.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +16,20 @@!!! error TS2339: Property 'h1' does not exist on type 'JSX.IntrinsicElements'.
     ~~~~~~~~~
!!! error TS2604: JSX element type 'CustomTag' does not have any construct or call signatures.
